recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A simple, timeless Italian pizza featuring fresh mozzarella, bright tomato sauce, and aromatic basil on a crisp crust.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with slices of fresh mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
Slice and serve hot.

recipes.name: Authentic Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Quick and flavorful Mexican beef tacos seasoned perfectly and ready to be loaded with your favorite fresh toppings.
ingredients: Salsa and sour cream for topping
instructions: Brown the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat, drain excess fat.
Stir in taco seasoning and water. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Warm the tortillas according to package directions.
Spoon beef mixture into tortillas.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Spicy Thai Green Curry with Chicken
recipes.description: An aromatic Thai classic featuring tender chicken and crisp vegetables simmered in a creamy, spicy green coconut milk sauce.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into cubes
Fresh basil and lime for garnish
instructions: Heat a wok or large pot over medium heat. Add curry paste and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Stir in chicken and cook until lightly browned.
Pour in coconut milk and chicken broth. Bring to a simmer.
Add bell pepper and bamboo shoots. Simmer for 10-15 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot over rice, garnished with fresh basil and a squeeze of lime.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Butter Salmon
recipes.description: Flaky, tender salmon baked to perfection with a bright, savory sauce of lemon, garlic, and melted butter.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with foil.
Place salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet.
In a small bowl, mix melted butter, minced garlic, and lemon juice.
Brush the mixture over the salmon fillets.
Season with salt and pepper, and top with lemon slices.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon flakes easily with a fork.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Classic French Omelette
recipes.description: A refined and quick breakfast or brunch, this simple omelette is known for its silky texture and pale, golden exterior.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Whisk the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper until just combined (do not over-whisk).
Melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat until foamy.
Pour in the egg mixture.
Continuously stir with a fork for about 30 seconds, then shake the pan to evenly distribute the eggs.
Let the omelette cook undisturbed for another minute until the edges are set and the center is slightly moist.
Sprinkle chives over the center, fold the omelette into thirds, and slide onto a plate.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Hearty Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A comforting, nutritious, and easy-to-make vegetarian soup packed with fiber and flavorful vegetables.
ingredients: 1 cup brown or green lentils, rinsed
instructions: In a large pot, sauté onion, carrots, and celery in a little olive oil until soft (about 5-7 minutes).
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
Stir in the lentils, broth, and thyme. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 45-60 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: The quintessential American treat: soft centers, chewy edges, and plenty of melted chocolate chips in every bite.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on wire racks.

recipes.name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick, customizable, and healthy weeknight dinner featuring lean chicken and crisp vegetables in a savory sauce.
ingredients: Stir-fry sauce (soy sauce, ginger, garlic, honey mixture)
instructions: Toss chicken with soy sauce and cornstarch; set aside.
Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through. Remove from wok.
Add vegetables to the wok and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return chicken to the wok. Pour stir-fry sauce over everything and toss to coat.
Serve immediately over rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
recipes.description: Fluffy, classic American pancakes that are easy to make and perfect for a sweet and comforting breakfast.
ingredients: Maple syrup and fresh berries for topping
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, egg, and melted butter.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined (do not overmix).
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle to form pancakes of your desired size.
Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until bubbles appear on the surface and the edges are set.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve hot with maple syrup and berries.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad with Balsamic Glaze
recipes.description: A light and refreshing Italian salad featuring fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, basil, and a sweet, tangy balsamic reduction.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Arrange alternating slices of tomato, mozzarella, and basil leaves on a platter.
Drizzle generously with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Finish with a drizzle of balsamic glaze.
Serve immediately as a side or light lunch.

recipes.name: One-Pan Sausage and Peppers
recipes.description: A simple, minimal-cleanup meal featuring hearty Italian sausage roasted with tender, colorful bell peppers and onions.
ingredients: 1 lb Italian sausage (sweet or hot), sliced
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss sausage, peppers, and onion with olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper on a large baking sheet.
Spread in a single layer.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through, until sausage is cooked and vegetables are tender.
Serve in crusty rolls or over rice/pasta.

recipes.name: Pad Thai with Shrimp
recipes.description: The quintessential Thai street food: stir-fried rice noodles tossed in a signature sweet, sour, and savory sauce with tender shrimp.
ingredients: Pad Thai sauce (tamarind, fish sauce, sugar, lime juice)
instructions: Soak rice noodles in hot water for 15 minutes, then drain.
Heat oil in a large wok. Cook shrimp and garlic until pink; remove.
Scramble eggs in the wok, then push to one side.
Add drained noodles and sauce to the wok. Toss to coat and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Return shrimp to the wok, and stir in bean sprouts.
Cook for 1 minute, toss with peanuts, and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Overnight Oats
recipes.description: A simple, no-cook breakfast made by soaking oats in milk and mix-ins overnight, perfect for grab-and-go mornings.
ingredients: 1/4 cup chopped fruit (e.g., berries, banana) for topping
instructions: In a jar or container, combine oats, milk, chia seeds, maple syrup/honey, and vanilla extract.
Stir well to combine all ingredients.
Seal the container and refrigerate overnight (at least 6 hours).
In the morning, stir the oats and add your desired toppings.
Enjoy cold.

recipes.name: Classic Beef Chili
recipes.description: A hearty, thick American-style chili with ground beef, beans, and a rich, spicy tomato base, perfect for a cold day.
ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz each) kidney beans, rinsed and drained
instructions: Brown ground beef, onion, and garlic in a large pot; drain excess fat.
Stir in chili powder and cumin, cook for 1 minute.
Add kidney beans, diced tomatoes (undrained), and tomato sauce.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours for best flavor.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve with desired toppings (cheese, sour cream).

recipes.name: Hummus with Pita Bread
recipes.description: A smooth, creamy Middle Eastern dip made from blended chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic, served with warm pita.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) chickpeas, drained and rinsed (reserve liquid)
2-4 tablespoons reserved chickpea liquid or water
Pita bread and olive oil for serving
instructions: Combine chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and salt in a food processor.
Blend until smooth, scraping down the sides as needed.
While processing, slowly drizzle in the reserved liquid or water until the hummus reaches your desired creamy consistency.
Transfer to a serving bowl. Drizzle with olive oil.
Serve immediately or chill for later with warm pita bread.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Roman pasta dish made with a rich, creamy sauce of eggs, Pecorino cheese, guanciale (or pancetta), and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water.
While pasta cooks, crisp the guanciale/pancetta in a skillet over medium heat. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, Pecorino Romano, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Drain pasta and immediately toss it in the skillet with the rendered fat and guanciale/pancetta.
Quickly pour the egg mixture over the hot pasta and toss constantly until a creamy sauce forms (use reserved pasta water if too dry).
Serve immediately, topped with more Pecorino and black pepper.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.description: A moist, sweet, and comforting quick bread, perfect for using up overripe bananas for a snack or breakfast treat.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a loaf pan.
Whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Cream together butter and brown sugar.
Beat in eggs and vanilla, then stir in mashed bananas.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender pieces of chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then simmered in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, half of the garam masala, turmeric, and ginger-garlic paste for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pot. Cook marinated chicken until browned; remove and set aside.
In the same pot, sauté the remaining spices.
Stir in tomato purée, bring to a simmer, and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and return chicken to the pot.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes until chicken is cooked through and sauce has thickened.
Serve hot with basmati rice or naan bread.

recipes.name: Simple Tomato Soup
recipes.description: A velvety, classic tomato soup with minimal ingredients, perfect on its own or paired with a grilled cheese sandwich.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot. Sauté onion until soft, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth.
Bring to a simmer, cover, and cook for 20 minutes.
Use an immersion blender (or carefully transfer to a regular blender) to blend the soup until smooth.
Stir in heavy cream (if using) and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast with Everything Bagel Seasoning
recipes.description: A quick, satisfying, and modern classic featuring creamy mashed avocado on toast, topped with savory, crunchy seasoning.
instructions: Toast the bread to your preference.
In a small bowl, mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly over the two slices of toast.
Sprinkle generously with Everything Bagel seasoning.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Baked Feta Pasta (TikTok Trend)
recipes.description: The viral one-pan pasta where a block of feta and cherry tomatoes are baked until melty, then tossed with hot pasta.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a large baking dish, combine cherry tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, and red pepper flakes.
Place the block of feta in the center of the tomatoes.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until tomatoes are burst and feta is soft and lightly browned.
While baking, cook pasta according to package directions.
Remove the dish from the oven and stir the feta and tomatoes until a creamy sauce forms.
Add the drained pasta and toss to combine. Garnish with basil.

recipes.name: Homemade Guacamole
recipes.description: A fresh, zesty, and simple dip made from mashed avocado, lime juice, red onion, and cilantro, perfect with tortilla chips.
instructions: In a medium bowl, mash the avocados to your desired consistency.
Stir in the red onion, cilantro, jalapeño (if using), lime juice, and salt.
Mix gently until just combined.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips.

recipes.name: Roast Chicken with Root Vegetables
recipes.description: A comforting, all-in-one meal of a whole roasted chicken seasoned with lemon and herbs, surrounded by tender root vegetables.
ingredients: 1 lb assorted root vegetables (carrots, potatoes), chopped
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Remove giblets from chicken. Pat the chicken dry.
Season the chicken cavity with salt and pepper, and stuff with lemon halves and rosemary.
Toss root vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place chicken in a roasting pan and surround it with the vegetables.
Roast for 60-75 minutes, or until the internal temperature of the chicken thigh reaches 165°F (74°C).
Let rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
recipes.description: A classic, quick-to-assemble sandwich with a creamy, savory tuna salad mix of tuna, mayonnaise, and celery.
ingredients: 2 slices bread, lettuce, and tomato for sandwich
instructions: In a small bowl, flake the drained tuna.
Stir in mayonnaise, celery, and Dijon mustard.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Spread the tuna salad mixture on one slice of bread.
Top with lettuce, tomato, and the second slice of bread.
Slice in half and serve.

recipes.name: Mango Sticky Rice
recipes.description: A famous Thai dessert featuring sweet, glutinous rice soaked in coconut milk, served with fresh, juicy slices of mango.
instructions: Rinse sticky rice until water runs clear. Soak for 3-4 hours, then steam for 20 minutes until cooked.
While rice cooks, heat coconut milk, sugar, and salt in a small saucepan until sugar dissolves.
Pour half of the coconut milk mixture over the hot steamed rice and stir until absorbed.
Cover and let stand for 10 minutes.
Serve the sticky rice alongside slices of fresh mango.
Drizzle with the remaining coconut milk sauce and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

recipes.name: Easy Greek Salad
recipes.description: A light and refreshing Mediterranean salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta, dressed simply with olive oil and oregano.
ingredients: 4 oz feta cheese, cut into cubes or crumbled
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, and Kalamata olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the vegetables and toss gently to coat.
Top the salad with feta cheese.
Serve immediately or chill briefly.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Black Bean Burgers
recipes.description: Hearty, flavorful vegetarian patties made with black beans and spices, perfect for grilling or pan-frying and serving on a bun.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) black beans, rinsed and mashed
Lettuce, tomato, and condiments for topping
instructions: In a large bowl, combine mashed black beans, breadcrumbs, onion, ketchup, chili powder, and egg.
Mix well and form into four patties.
Heat a skillet over medium heat with a little oil.
Cook patties for 5-7 minutes per side, until heated through and browned.
Serve on buns with your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: Shepherd's Pie (Lamb)
recipes.description: A classic British comfort dish featuring savory ground lamb and vegetables simmered in gravy, topped with a layer of creamy mashed potatoes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk and 2 tbsp butter for mash
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lamb in a skillet; drain fat. Add onion and carrots and cook until soft.
Stir in tomato paste, beef broth, and rosemary. Simmer for 10 minutes until liquid reduces slightly.
Pour the meat mixture into a casserole dish.
Top evenly with mashed potatoes.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.

recipes.name: Quick Garlic Noodles
recipes.description: A simple, ultra-fast Asian-fusion dish featuring noodles tossed in a rich, buttery, and savory sauce heavily flavored with fresh garlic and soy.
instructions: Cook noodles according to package directions; drain and set aside.
In the same pot, melt butter over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute (do not let it burn).
Stir in soy sauce and oyster sauce (if using).
Return the noodles to the pot and toss to coat.
Remove from heat, stir in Parmesan cheese, and toss until melted and creamy.
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve hot.

recipes.name: No-Bake Peanut Butter Bars
recipes.description: An easy, irresistible dessert with a thick, sweet peanut butter and graham cracker base, topped with a smooth layer of chocolate ganache.
instructions: Line an 8x8 inch baking dish with parchment paper.
In a bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, powdered sugar, melted butter, and peanut butter until a thick dough forms.
Press the mixture firmly into the prepared baking dish.
In a separate, microwave-safe bowl, melt the chocolate chips and vegetable oil together, stirring until smooth.
Pour the melted chocolate evenly over the peanut butter base.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours until the chocolate layer is set.
Cut into bars before serving.
